entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Ivujivik

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
